unnormalised: Borem, mhunnllear, tum shift korchea vishayant tharaita, hãi? Aamchea hea pixea, sundor Bharotant ekdom boro ‘adda’ sodhta hãi? Mhaka sangonk di, eka bori residential address sodop mhunnllear fokot nidhonk zago sodop nhõi. To ek zago astã zo ghara bhaxen *distã*, zago zo zoddlelo asta, ani zago zannim tum dis bhorachea thakonnanchea uprant thondd zaunk xokta.
normalised: Borem, tor, tum shift zaunk sochtai, mhunnona? Amchea hea pischeponnan bhorlea, sundor Bharotant tem ekdom borem ‘adda’ sodtat? Polle, hanv tuka sangtam, ek borem residential address sodop mhonnge fokot nidhonk zago sodop nhoi. Tem mhonnge ghar zoxem *dista* oso zago sodop, eka zageak zoddun asop, ani ekdom boreakuch disa uprant tum bhov thonddai gheunk xokta oso zago.

unnormalised: Poilem, suvat, suvat, suvat! Tem pustokantolem purannem updesh, punn khorem, khas korun Bharotant. Tummchea dispattechea yete-votecho vichar kora. Tum 'A-5, Shanti Nagar, Ghaziabad, 201001' hanga jiyet zalear, ti ekdom bhayanak zateli? Vo tumchea officeak laggi, '2B, Sector 15, Noida, U.P., 201301', ek chotur chal zateli? Public transportak yete-voitecho vicharui kora. Tumchi gaddi tutt'tt zalear vo petrolacher thodde ₹ bachounk tum prayatn kortat zalear tum addkun ravonk nhãkai.
normalised: Poilem, zago, zago, zago! Tem pustokantolem purannem updesh, punn khorench soth, khas korun Bharotant. Tumchea disachea yete-vetecher vichar korat. Tum 'A-five, Shanti Nagar, Ghaziabad, two zero one double zero one' hanga ravle zalear tem bhirantichem zatolem? Vo tumchea office-achea lagim kiteim, zoxem ‘two B, Sector fifteen, Noida, U-P, two zero one three zero one’, eka chotur chalonk zatolem? Public transport-achea pautaicher-ui vichar korat. Tumchea gaddient bhang zatolem zalear, vo tum petrolacher thodde rupe dakoounk sodtal zalear, tum attkun ravonk zainam.

unnormalised: Ani suvidhe vishayant uloup korun, neighborhood koxem asa? Tem bazarak laggi asa? Fokot dudh haddunk 'C-4/24, Model Town, Delhi, 110009' hanga vochonk poddttolem mhunn kalpna kora! Ekea ut'tom zagear tumcho address kirana dukanam, voizki dukanam, ani borem chai stall aslolo zago zai. Tacho vichar kora - dis bhorachea uprant khonnxeacher sanjechi chai. Sukh!
normalised: Ani sovayechim uloita astana, tumchea xezarche vixim kiteim? Tem bazarak lagim asa? Fokot thodem duk sodunk ‘C-four divided by twenty four, Model Town, Delhi, one one double zero double zero nine’ hangachean soglle vattellean vochonk poddtolem mhunn kalpona korat! Ut'tomponnan, tumchem address grocery store, pharmacies, ani kiteim bore chai-chem stall-achea lagim asunk zai. Tacher vichar korat – eka lamb disa uprant konxeache dukonant sandhyakalinchi chai. Anand!

unnormalised: Uprant tumchea koxe porinche somaz tumkam zai asa. Tum 'Tower 8, Orchid Heights, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore, 560076', bhaxen eka gajrollea apartment complexant jieunk sodta, zaka khõinchem tori ghoddta? Vo '14, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Kolkata, West Bengal, 700001' bhaxen eka ekllea ghara bhaxen eka residential zagear jieunk sodta? Dhonni, traffic, ani akhea vibe vixim vichar kora.
normalised: Uprant tumak zai asli community koxi asa. Tumak ‘Tower eight, Orchid Heights, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore, five six double zero seven six’ koxem eka gajgazit apartment complex zai asa, zanchean kiteim-i ghoddtta ravta? Vo ‘fourteen, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Kolkata, West Bengal, seven double zero double zero one’ koxem eka residential bhagant eka eklean ubhem kelolem ghar zai asa? Ghosghoxo, trafick ani bhurgeponachem vibe tacher vichar korat.

unnormalised: Suraksha, tankã ghoddta, paramamunh. Zageachea crime rateacher shodh kora. Thãichya lokam kodden uloup kora. Tumchea sambhavit addressacher security guards vo CCTV cameras asat zalear polleat, 'H.No. 12-2-823/A/4, Mehdipatnam, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500028' aspasachea apartment blocks bhaxen. Eka surakxit address mhunnllear monachi xanti, ani taka mull na.
normalised: Suraksha mhonnge mhonnge, soktem. Te bhagantle crime rate-acher sodat. Thoddea sthanik lokanchean uloiat. Tumchea sambhavit address-acher security guards vo C-C-T-V cameras asat mhunn polleiat, zoxem ‘H-point N-o-point twelve dash two dash eight two three slash A slash four, Mehdipatnam, Hyderabad, Telangana, five double zero double zero two eight’ asa, oxe bhagantle apartment blocks-an. Eka surakshit address-achem mhonnge monachi santi, ani tem amolik asa.

unnormalised: Atam, aami kaide vishim uloup korum. Tumi kainch sign korchea adim, tea propertyak zai asloleo sogleo maniateo ani clearances asat mhunn thir kora. Malikiche kãgz potrank sambhallun porikxa kora. Tummak ek kaideachea tantyãnt chodd dhuvank poddonk nhãkai, khas korun tim address puranne propertiesachim bhag asat zannim '4/6, Armenian Street, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, 600001' bhaxen jatil itihas asat. Ek boro voiz tumkam hem cholounk madot korunk xokta.
normalised: Atam, aikatay kanunache vixim. Tum kiteim-i sign korchea poilim, te property-ak zai asli maniotai ani clear kelole asat mhunn nirdhar korat. Dhonipanache kagdok bore bhaxen check korat. Tumak uprant kanunachea zanjalant poddonk zainam, khas korun tem address ‘four slash six, Armenian Street, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, six double zero double zero one’ hanga asli puranne properties-achea bhagantlean asonk xoktat. Ek boro vakil tumak hea vattenlean vochonk modot korunk xakta.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tumchea monacher vishvas dovora. To address boro *distā*? Tum tumka thãi jieuta, yadnãn bandhta, ani taka ghor mhunn sodunk xokta? Kaddechiek, eka ut'tom address ekdom boro vo suvidhecho nhãi, punn to ek dom boro *click* kortā. Mhunn, thaim vochot, shodhta, ani Bharotachea sundor pixepaṇãn modhen tumchem ut'tom 'ghar' sodhat!
normalised: Nimannem, tumchea gut-acher visvas dovrat. Tem address boreakuch *dista*? Tum thonddai ghetana, yadei ubharta astana, ani taka ghar mhunn uloita astana thim ravunk saktai? Kednam kednam, te ekdom ut'tom address torponik vo sovayecho nastat, punn tem ekdom *click* zata tem asa. Tor, thoim vochot, sodat, ani Bharotachea sundor ghondgolant tumchem ut'tom ‘ghar’ sodat!
